title: Bug 116609 - [Regression] Color orange doesn't work
description: The color orange is not working as expected in the application. When attempting to set a color or background color to orange, it does not appear correctly. This issue seems to have started after a recent update.
OB: When I tried to preview the report, the orange color did not work as expected.
EB: I would expect the orange color to be displayed correctly when setting it as the color or background color for a report item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Insert a report item. 
2. Set the color or background color to orange. 
3. Preview the report and observe that the orange color is not displayed correctly.
